Package presenters.gui

Class GUI

  • java.lang.Object
    • presenters.gui.GUI
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    GameIO
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    BuraGUI, CrazyEightsGUI, GoFishGUI, MainMenuGUI, UserDisplayGUI, WarGUI
    public class GUI
extends java.lang.Object
implements GameIO
    Class that instantiates a basic GUI. Game specific GUIs extend this class and gain its functionality. This class creates menus and windows which the users will view and interact with

    • Method Detail

      • update

        protected void update()
        This method updates the window and redraws everything on the screen. This should be called whenever you want changes to be seen by the user.

      • stringToImage

        protected java.lang.String stringToImage​(java.lang.String cardString)
        Takes a string representation of a card and returns the address of the image for that card.
        Parameters:
        cardString - the String representation of the card you want an image of
        Returns:
        the address of a the image of that card.
